presets.name: DecisionDesk – Standard Meeting
presets.template: Summarize in PT-BR with sections: Objectives, Decisions, Actions (owner/deadline), Risks, Open Items. Participants: {{participants}}. History: {{history}}. Level: {{level}}.

presets.name: Supplier Session
presets.template: Synthesize evolution vs history: {{history}}. List decisions and open items with owner/deadline. Professional tone. Level: {{level}}.

presets.name: Church Service
presets.template: Summarize sermon/service in PT-BR: Theme, References, Highlights. Level: {{level}}.
